update WH_GOODS_RECEIPT
CREATE_ADMIN = #{createAdmin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RECEIPT_AMOUNT = #{receiptAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECEIPT_TICKETS = #{receiptTickets,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACT_RECEIPT_AMOUNT = #{actReceiptAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACT_RECEIPT_TICKETS = #{actReceiptTickets,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

CARRIER_CONTACT = #{carrierContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SEND_WH = #{sendWh,jdbcType=CHAR},
SEND_MANAGER = #{sendManager,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SEND_DATE = #{sendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where SGR_NO = #{sgrNo,jdbcType=CHAR}

update WH_GOODS_RECEIPT set CREATE_ADMIN = #{createAdmin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RECEIPT_AMOUNT = #{receiptAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECEIPT_TICKETS = #{receiptTickets,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACT_RECEIPT_AMOUNT = #{actReceiptAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACT_RECEIPT_TICKETS = #{actReceiptTickets,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PLAN_CODE = #{planCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REF_NO = #{refNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CARRIER = #{carrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARRY_DATE = #{carryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CARRIER_CONTACT = #{carrierContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_ORG = #{sendOrg,jdbcType=CHAR}, SEND_WH = #{sendWh,jdbcType=CHAR}, SEND_MANAGER = #{sendManager,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SEND_DATE = #{sendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where SGR_NO = #{sgrNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
